text:
Mick's apartments was very good and cozy for us, it was very clean and light. There are all things you need for comfortable staying.

Apartments located at quiet street close to subway station and supermarket. We were at January and it was no problem with heat or hot water.

Mick was very friendly and helpful, he digged out us after snowfall :)

We recommend stay at Mick's apartments.
title: Self contained ground level apt
